Check the status of a Mapbox upload

Source: R/maps.R
check_upload_status.Rd

Check the status of a Mapbox upload

Usage

check_upload_status(upload_id, username, access_token = NULL)

Arguments

upload_id

The upload ID

username

Your account's username

access_token

Your Mapbox access token
